properties.name: BillingPeriodName
properties.help: Name of the billing period to get the price sheet.

properties.name: IncludeMeterDetails
properties.help: Include meter details in the price sheet.

properties.name: Amount
properties.help: Amount of a budget.

properties.name: BudgetName
properties.help: Name of a budget.

properties.name: Category
properties.help: Category of the budget can be cost or usage.

properties.name: EndDate
properties.help: End date (YYYY-MM-DD in UTC) of time period of a budget.

properties.name: StartDate
properties.help: Start date (YYYY-MM-DD in UTC) of time period of a budget.

properties.name: TimeGrain
properties.help: Time grain of the budget can be monthly, quarterly, or annually.

properties.name: MeterFilter
properties.help: Space-separated list of meters to filter on. Required if category is usage.

properties.name: ResourceFilter
properties.help: Space-separated list of resource instances to filter on.

properties.name: ResourceGroup
properties.help: Name of resource group. You can configure the default group using `az configure --defaults group=&lt;name&gt;`.

properties.name: ResourceGroupFilter
properties.help: Space-separated list of resource groups to filter on.

properties.name: BudgetName
properties.help: Name of a budget.

properties.name: ResourceGroup
properties.help: Name of resource group. You can configure the default group using `az configure --defaults group=&lt;name&gt;`.

properties.help: Name of resource group. You can configure the default group using `az configure --defaults group=&lt;name&gt;`.

properties.name: BudgetName

properties.name: ResourceGroup
properties.help: Name of resource group. You can configure the default group using `az configure --defaults group=&lt;name&gt;`.

properties.name: BillingPeriodName
properties.help: Name of the billing period to get the marketplace.

properties.name: EndDate
properties.help: End date (YYYY-MM-DD in UTC). If specified, also requires --start-date.

properties.name: StartDate
properties.help: Start date (YYYY-MM-DD in UTC). If specified, also requires --end-date.

properties.name: Top
properties.help: Maximum number of items to return. Value range: 1-1000.

properties.name: BillingPeriodName
properties.help: Name of the billing period to get the usage details that associate with.

properties.name: EndDate
properties.help: End date (YYYY-MM-DD in UTC). If specified, also requires --start-date.

properties.name: IncludeAdditionalProperties
properties.help: Include additional properties in the usages.

properties.name: IncludeMeterDetails
properties.help: Include meter details in the usages.

properties.name: StartDate
properties.help: Start date (YYYY-MM-DD in UTC). If specified, also requires --end-date.

properties.name: Top
properties.help: Maximum number of items to return. Value range: 1-1000.

properties.name: Grain
properties.help: Reservation summary grain. Possible values are daily or monthly.

properties.name: ReservationOrderId
properties.help: Reservation order id.

properties.name: EndDate
properties.help: End date (YYYY-MM-DD in UTC). Only needed for daily grain and if specified, also requires --start-date.

properties.name: ReservationId
properties.help: Reservation id.

properties.help: Start date (YYYY-MM-DD in UTC). Only needed for daily grain and if specified, also requires --end-date.

commonTaskProperties.help: Show this help message and exit.
